Please scan the barcode on the back of the driver\'s document

%s has asked Mitek to verify your ID.

To do this, Mitek will ask you to provide personal data including location, facial and document images. We will not share your personal data with any third party except %s.


By clicking Agree and Continue you give your consent to the processing and sharing of your personal data including facial images. Please see our terms and privacy policy.
Does this document have the applicant name and address
Thank you for the Selfies! You can now move on to the next item.
Prior to Initialing the process, please ensure a stable broadband connection.
Both the video and audio will be recorded throughout the session.
During this video recording, we will:
The Video ID entails a video recording involving you and our automated video platform.
Our automated interactive video platform will verify your identity
Before you continue with the video call, we need a few more details:
Not a valid identity request or the request already opened on a different device
To scan your %s hold your phone directly against the document as instructed
Remove your phone case if it is thick or metallic
Hold your phone directly up against the %s until the scan is fully completed
If %s scan doesn\'t start - restart your phone
Please apply a privacy filter to your document, follow the guidance of the sample provided below
Draw a line to cover the last 9 digits of the BSN number
Use Zoom/Mask button to toggle between image zoom and masking
Use two fingers to zoom the image and one finger to move the image when in zoom mode
Use one finger to draw the line when in mask mode
Are you satisfied with the masking of your document?
By providing your voice samples, you consent to processing of the data by Mitek.
You will be asked to capture 3 voice samples. While recording read out the phrase shown on the screen loud and clear in a quiet room.
You need to capture a voice sample for verification. While recording read out the phrase shown on the screen loud and clear in a quiet room.
In order to prevent fraud, do you want us to keep your voice for future authentications?
Your results have not yet been generated but they should be shortly.
Verify with your online bank account
You\'ll need to capture your voice
Our certified agent will verify your identity over a video call
You can use any of the following documents
You\'ll need to upload your signature. Please take a photo of it on a white background with black ink
You\'ll need to submit a picture of the back and front of one of your payment cards (credit or debit) Please take a photo of it on a white page
You can use a proof of address document
You can use 1 or more photo IDs
You can use 1 or more online profiles
We will guide you on how to take a selfie
In order to prevent fraud, do you want us to keep your selfie for future authentications?
This will allow your name to be shown in the app\'s proof of age feature.
If you do not have any documents matching the full name of this request, you might need to cancel the request.
Click below only if you want to stop the process completely.
Please provide a brief message we can pass onto %s:
Something went wrong. Please try again later
This request has now been cancelled

When selected date of birth will be shown in My Identity. Set to off to hide date of birth in My Identity

Do you allow Mitek to authenticate you to %s. You will provide:
No verified phone found. Please verify your phone in My Account menu.
No personal data stored. Please complete Mitek request before use it for authentication.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
NFC disabled. Please enable NFC in device settings to get better outcome.
%s is requesting that you share your identity details, please select from the list below what you would like to share:
We will send a mobile verification code to this number:
Your previous number will be replaced
Something went wrong. Please try again later
We\'ve sent a code to %s. It may take a few moments to arrive.
We will send verification code to this email:
Your previous email will be replaced
By connecting to your online bank account, you consent to processing of the data by Mitek.
On clicking on continue, you will:
You will get redirected to select your bank country and the bank you wish to connect to.
You will be asked to login to your bank account.
On successful login, you will be redirected back to the verification process.
You are going to delete the bank account data stored in your device. Are you sure?
Scanning NFC chip is set as mandatory in request for this document, but your device has no NFC support. You cannot add this document with current device.
Scanning chip is set as mandatory in request for this document
The easy and safe way to share your identity under Your Digital Identity Wallet
Thank you for setting up your Mitek app! You are now ready to start building you Digital Identity
We need your mobile number to send you a verification code
Please enter your email below. We will send you a verification code
Please enter the 5 digit code we have sent to %s
Please create a memorable 5-digit PIN. You will need this PIN to log into the app.
PIN doesn\'t match. Please create a new 5-digit PIN
Proof of Address any Bank, Utility, Phone, Insurance or Tax document that was issued within the last %s months and displays the date of issue, your name and current address.
Bank Statements that were issued within the last %s months and displays the date of issue, some transaction history (front page only), your name and current address.

Utility Bills from any gas, water broadband/internet, electricity or land line telephone provider (no mobile phone bills) that have been issued within the last %s months and displays the date of issue, your name and current address.
Driver\'s licences that display your photo, name, date of birth, issued and/or expiry dates. This includes provisional Driver\'s licenses.
National Identity cards Internationally formatted documents only, we do not accept domestic ID cards.
Insurance Documents or certificates for home, contents or vehicle that was issued within the %s months and displays the date of issue, your name and current address.
PASS Cards that display the PASS hologram such as the Citizencard, The Young Scot Card or the Validate UK proof of age card.
International passports excluding emergency, temporary and diplomatic passports as well as travel documents.
National Residence Permits - internationally formatted documents only, we do not accept domestic Residence Permits.

Tax Documents including council tax statements and letters from HMRC or other national revenue department that was issued within the last %s months and displays the date of issue, your name and current address.
Travel Visas attached to your international passport.
You are going to delete document data stored in your device. Are you sure?
There are no ID documents stored
You are going to delete all data stored in your device. Are you sure?
There are no Proof of Address documents stored

There is no selfie image stored

There is no signature image stored
You are going to delete %s data stored in your device. Are you sure?
There is no digital account data stored
Upload readable document file or image no larger than 30MB on a pdf, jpg, jpeg, png, tiff or gif format only.

Keep it flat with space around the edges
Make sure it\'s in focus and without any glare or flash

Check there is no glare or white spots
Place the document on a flat surface
Capture all four corners of the document

Check the photo is a close up of your full head
Consent to share requested identity data

Enabling this feature will mean that your permission is always required to share the specific identity details which are being requested. This allows you to share only the information which you are comfortable with.
This only allows biometric signing into the app, rather than use of your passcode. Passcode will then only be required if biometric login fails.
Here you can change your 5 digit login code
Cannot change passcode. Please try again.
Confirm passcode should not be empty.
Current passcode should not be empty.
New passcode should not be empty.
New and confirm passcode do not match.

Save your identity for future use. This will allow your identity documents (which we have previously verified) and the personal data extracted from them to be re-used for future sharing when your identity is requested. In the meantime, everything will be stored safely and securely on your device.
Please share this code with the recipient: %s
Something went wrong while generating your share URL. Please try again later.

Online accounts are used to prevent the impersonation of your identity. We use the profile data and other permissions to confirm you are who you say you are. We do not use the data for any other purpose.

resources.string: You can choose to add non mandatory digital ID
Why do we need your online accounts?
We found the name %s on your %s profile. It is different from the name given by %s who entered %s.
Something went wrong while creating your request. Please try again later.
Here you can update existing or add missing personal data. Choose what you want to update or add:
Wrong code, Please check the 4 digits verification code from the browser and try again
Our certified agent will verify your ID document over a video call. Before you continue, we need a few more details:
Not sure what these questions are and why it is required?
Thank you. Your video verification is now completed.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Before you start, please make sure you have stable broadband.
Video ID is a video call between you and our certified agent.
During this video call, the agent will:
Take a picture of you and your ID document
Check that your ID document is valid and not expired
Send an SMS to your mobile phone with a verification code
Request access to your device camera and microphone
Audio/video permissions are required for video verification
More information on the details we need from you and why is it required for your video verification
Document type: Please select a document that you have on hand and ready to show to the agent. Make sure that the document is valid and not expired.
Document Country: Select the document issuing country that you are using for the video verification.
Video call language: Select your preferred language for the video call with the certified agent.
Mobile phone number: During the video verification, the agent will send an SMS to your mobile phone with a unique code which is part of the verification process.

Bandwidth test: Since video verification is done via a video call, you must have stable internet connection to continue. Run the internet speed test to find out if your internet speed meets the minimum requirement.
